start.story: You are currently sailing the 7 seas when you come across an island.  What do you want to do?

option2.reason: Your ship hit an iceberg and all of your crew died

find_map.story: On the island you find a map, would you like to collect it?

treasure.story: There is treasure on the island, Where is it located?

option2.reason: You needed the map all captains know that
